name: Hack Tamil Nadu
tagline: Giving back to the community through websites and webapplications
body:
### Who we are?

In simple words, we are a crowd of people who sit and hack for community. 

Some words that represents us - non-profits, open-source people, free software people, Altruists, Batman!

### What we do?

We create websites, web-applications, softwares and anything and everything that can be a contribution to the community through programming. 

### Why we do this?

For fun, for a satisfaction that we are giving back something back to the community, for learning

### Vow! You guys seem to be interesting can I join your team?

Come on board over! Why are you asking permission! You don't knock your friends door, you just slam it open!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
